name: Cronospad
description: Cronospad is the first major micro & Small Cap decentralised Launchpad on Cronos Chain. Our vision is straight forward to build a dencentralized and safe launchpad on Cronos Network. Key Points or Features: -Tier System : Our Tier System has been designed in a way that holders and believers in Cronospad will be rewarded the most. - Guaranteed Allocation : Holding tokens gives access to Guaranteed allocation that is directly proportional to number of tokens held and holding duration. - Curated Projects : Projects launching on Cronospad have to go through strict evaluation and selection mechanism and should tick all the boxes in order to get on our launchpad. - Early Sale Access : Projects launching on Cronospad will have an option to offer both pre public and public round tokens. - Token Utilities : Holding Cronospad Token Grants you some amazing benefits. ✔️Guaranteed Allocation will be rewarded to our Token holders according to Tier system ✔️Token holders can enjoy many upcoming premium features ✔️Access to our future upcoming sales ✔️Grants Access to Exclusive NFT drops. ✔️Many More.... Backers & Investors : Moonstarter,InfinityPad,Dutch Crypto Investors,CeloLaunch, Regain Ventures,Flow Investments,Fish Dao,AB Ventures, Coinvestor VC,DCT Capital,Eagle Rise Capital,Doble J Capital, CB Capital, Spaceship Ventures, InSquare VC, 0xResearch, RedSwiss Venture Capital And more
